p: For most of EOs tested, time of exposure did not have a significant effect on percentage of mortality, indicating that a knock down effect is rapidly observed ( Table 4). However, this observation does not hold for three EOs after 24 h and 7 days, Thymus vulgaris CT geraniol, Myristica fragrans and O. sanctum, indicating a cumulative toxic effect probably linked to physiological or neurological disorders.
